title: WTB: SL Old Mill Perry Lipe
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: WTB: SL Old Mill Perry Lipe
posts.post_content: Anyone got a SL card with Old Mill back of Perry Lipe they are looking to part with?  Not looking for anything extravagant, a 2 or 3 grade or raw as long as it would grade out close to that.  Thanks!
